page.title: 01Housing
page.content: There are a variety of homes in our block from very large houses to small cottages. Most of the houses are owner occupied although some farm workers still live in cottages and houses which are owned by the farmers. There are four blocks of terraced properties which are two storeys high. There are about 18 semi-detached houses and bungalows. Most of the housing is detached, quite a number of these have not been standing very long. There are four different estates which are new developments. Some have been built with brick and others with Yorkshire stone. There are six large farms and six large manors or halls which are still lived in.
